name: pkw.de (Caroo Group)
overview:
pkw.de is one of Germanyâ€™s top 3 car exchanges for used and pre-registered cars. This online car exchange offers dealers special sales packages for marketing cars and numerous free services for end customers. The site also includes a practical offer generator, putting an end to buyers having to search for cars â€“ and offering them their dream car at advantageous prices, even if they are not advertised on the Internet. Instead of having to search through advertisements, the buyer simply enters the desired details in the offer generator and the pkw.de dealer receives the actual purchase request, filtered by the input specifications. This allows dealers to also market cars that are not advertised on the Internet or that will be coming up for sale. iPhone, iPad and Facebook apps, dealer videos … pkw.de is continuously extending its facilities and services for dealers and for users.

As part of the Caroo Group located in Cologne â€“ and since 2011 also in Essen â€“ pkw.de offers its partners and customers a considerable potential and a future-proof foundation for a long-term cooperation. pkw.de, caroo.de, autotest.de: three strong brands of the Caroo Group, a wide range of products. The German company is managed by its experienced founder Boris Polenske, who as Managing Director and Partner has been responsible for the successful expansion of Caroo GmbH since July 2008.
